institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 10 (Operation of Dedicated Portal Site)
contents: Article 10 (Operation of Dedicated Portal Site) ① The Chairman of the Board shall operate a business-only portal site (hereinafter referred to as *World Job Plus) to collect, analyze and provide information desired by job seekers and recruiting companies. ② The main functions of World Job Plus according to paragraph 1 are as follows: 1. Provision of job information such as employment conditions by country and occupation, 2. Statistical data such as the status of job seekers and employed persons by country and occupation, 3. Language of job seekers Providing information to improve skills and job skills, 4. Operating a community for communication between job seekers and employed people, 5. Providing overseas expansion information such as visa information by country, 6. Language skills, job skills, education and work history, and overseas information for job seekers. Career database including training, overseas internship, overseas volunteer work, etc.
